-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/githubuser/FP#readme</a>
@package FP
@version 0.1.0.0


module Types

-- | This is the data structure that represents a User
data User
User :: String -> User

-- | The <a>username</a> method returns a username by which user is
--   uniquely identified
[username] :: User -> String

-- | This is the data structure that represents a Message
data Message
Message :: String -> String -> String -> Message

-- | The <a>text</a> method returns a text contained within the message
[text] :: Message -> String

-- | The <a>sender</a> method returns a username associated with the sender
--   of the message
[sender] :: Message -> String

-- | The <a>receiver</a> method returns a username associated with the
--   receiver of the message
[receiver] :: Message -> String
instance GHC.Show.Show Types.User
instance GHC.Show.Show Types.Message
